faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.question: Who is AMS?
faq.answer: AMS is a group for a project on NTNU in IT2805 consisting of Andreas Kjerstad, Marius Lundb√∏ and Stian Dysthe.
faq.question: What are you doing?
faq.answer: We are developing a website for a project in a web technology course.
faq.question: What technologies are you familiar with?
faq.answer: Spread among us we know techologies as: HTML, CSS, Javascript, Java, XML, jQuery, Actionscript, Github and Photoshop.
faq.question: Are you planning on continue devoloping as a group in the future?
faq.answer: That sure would be fun, but we'll see what the future brings.
